title: Kanban for altivar/inverter production at PT Schneider Electric Manufacturing Batam
abstract: This final project is focused on kanban implementation to increase labor productivity at PT Schneider Electric Manufacturing Batam. This final project is divided into four steps: design kanban, do implementation, make analysis and the last do improvement based on analysis that has done. The result from kanban implementation is success to increase labor productivity. It is increased around 14 % after kanban implementation.
contributors: Tanti Octavia (Advisor 1); PHILIPPE BICHON (Advisor 2); ADI WIDIADI (Advisor 3); Togar Wiliater Soaloon Panjaitan, S.T., MBA. (Examination Committee 1); WIRA SATRIA (Examination Committee 2)
